preparation of the training data. The training data is provided in standard weeks with eight
variables, speciﬁcally in the shape [159, 7, 8]. The ﬁrst step is to ﬂatten the data so that we
have eight time series sequences.
# flatten data
data = data.reshape((data.shape[0]*data.shape[1], data.shape[2]))
Listing 20.1: Example of ﬂattened weekly data.
